org.jasig.cas.authentication.support

Class OptionalWarningAccountStateHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.authentication.support.DefaultAccountStateHandler
      • org.jasig.cas.authentication.support.OptionalWarningAccountStateHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AccountStateHandler

    @Component(value="optionalWarningAccountStateHandler")
public class OptionalWarningAccountStateHandler
extends DefaultAccountStateHandler
    The component supports both opt-in and opt-out warnings on a per-user basis using a simple algorithm of three variables:
    1. warningAttributeName
    2. setWarningAttributeValue(String) warningAttributeValue}
    3. displayWarningOnMatch
    The first two parameters define an attribute on the user entry to match on, and the third parameter determines whether password expiration warnings should be displayed on match.

    Deployers MUST configure LDAP components to provide warningAttributeName in the set of attributes returned from the LDAP query for user details.

    Since:
    4.0.0

      • setDisplayWarningOnMatch

        public void setDisplayWarningOnMatch(boolean displayWarningOnMatch)
        Determines whether password expiration warnings are opt-in or opt-out.
        Parameters:
        displayWarningOnMatch - True to opt into password expiration warnings on match, false to opt out on match. Default is true.

      • handleWarning

        protected void handleWarning(org.ldaptive.auth.AccountState.Warning warning,
                 org.ldaptive.auth.AuthenticationResponse response,
                 LdapPasswordPolicyConfiguration configuration,
                 java.util.List<MessageDescriptor> messages)
        Description copied from class: DefaultAccountStateHandler
        Handle an account state warning produced by ldaptive account state machinery.

        Override this method to provide custom warning message handling.

        Overrides:
        handleWarning in class DefaultAccountStateHandler
        Parameters:
        warning - the account state warning messages.
        response - Ldaptive authentication response.
        configuration - Password policy configuration.
        messages - Container for messages produced by account state warning handling.
